00050 class OPENMM_EXPORT RBTorsionForce : public Force {
00051 public:
00055     RBTorsionForce();
00059     int getNumTorsions() const {
00060         return rbTorsions.size();
00061     }
00077     int addTorsion(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, double c0, double c1, double c2, double c3, double c4, double c5);
00093     void getTorsionParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, int& particle3, int& particle4, double& c0, double& c1, double& c2, double& c3, double& c4, double& c5) const;

00126 
00131 class RBTorsionForce::RBTorsionInfo {
00132 public:
00133     int particle1, particle2, particle3, particle4;
00134     double c[6];
00135     RBTorsionInfo() {
00136         particle1 = particle2 = particle3 = particle4 = -1;
00137         c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = c[3] = c[4] = c[5] = 0.0;
00138     }
00139     RBTorsionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, double c0, double c1, double c2, double c3, double c4, double c5) :
00140             particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), particle3(particle3), particle4(particle4) {
00141         c[0] = c0;
00142         c[1] = c1;
00143         c[2] = c2;
00144         c[3] = c3;
00145         c[4] = c4;
00146         c[5] = c5;
00147     }
00148 };
